title: Not part of Darwin's theory with 5 answer options

content.question: Which of the following principles is NOT part of Darwinâ€™s theory of evolution by natural selection?

choices.label: Evolution is a gradual process that occurs over long periods of time.
Variation occurs among individuals in a population.
Mutations are the ultimate source of genetic variation.
More individuals are born than will survive.
Individuals that possess the most favorable variations have the best chance of repro-ducing.

content.answer: Mutations are the ultimate source of genetic variation.
